Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Equation
Parameter.Whatis: The name of the equation.

Parameter.Name: Discontinuous Galerkin
Parameter.StatusTip: Needs to be set to true.

Parameter.Name: Variable
Parameter.Whatis: The name of the variable. As the variable is a DG variable (i.e., not renderable e.g. in ElmerPost), the user usually adds the option -nooutput in order to avoid output in the output files.

Parameter.Name: Steady State Convergence Tolerance
Parameter.Whatis: With this keyword a equation specific steady state or coupled system convergence tolerance is given. All the active equation solvers must meet their own tolerances for their variable c before the whole system is deemed converged. The tolerance criterion is: ||ci − ci−1|| < e||ci ||, where e is the value given with this keyword.

Parameter.Name: Limit Solution
Parameter.Whatis: Assumes the variational inequality method to apply, if set to true.

Parameter.Name: Exported Variable 1
Parameter.Whatis: in order to write the DG variable Variable_name to a for ElmerPost (non-DG mesh) readable variable, an exported variable with an arbitrary name (e.g., Exported Variable 1 = Variable_name Nodal Result) has to be defined. It is then used to interpolate the DG result to nodal values in order to display them.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Solver-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Solver-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Variable_name Source
Parameter.Whatis: defines the volumetric source for variable c

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the BodyForce-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the BodyForce-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Convection Velocity 1
Parameter.Whatis: Convection velocity i= 1for the constant convection model.

Parameter.Name: Convection Velocity 2
Parameter.Whatis: Convection velocity i= 2 for the constant convection model.

Parameter.Name: Convection Velocity 3
Parameter.Whatis: Convection velocity i= 3 for the constant convection model.

Parameter.Name: Variable_name Upper Limit
Parameter.Whatis: The upper limit, cmax, for variable Variable_name. Only used if keyword Limit Solution for the solver is set to true

Parameter.Name: Variable_name Lower Limit
Parameter.Whatis: The upper limit, cmin, for variable Variable_name. Only used if keyword Limit Solution for the solver is set to true

Parameter.Name: Variable_name Gamma
Parameter.Whatis: defines the reaction rate, Γ

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Material-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Material-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Variable_name
Parameter.Whatis: sets the initial value for the scalar c

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the InitialCondition-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the InitialCondition-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Variable_name
Parameter.Whatis: sets the value for c at inflow boundaries

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the BoundaryCondition-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the BoundaryCondition-block of the SIF as such.
